column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A woman in a Prius crashed into several vehicles at 8.45 pm on January 11
column8: Phnom Penh. .------The damaged vehicles included three motorbikes
column10: and a RX300 along with another
column15: and vehicle were stopped on the side of the road.  The accident occurred when the female driver crashed her car into them
column16: causing damage but no human injuries. ------According to the woman who was driving the car
column17: she lost control when she answered her phone.------The woman tried to coordinate with all parties to pay damages. The tuk-tuk owner accepted $300 as settlement
column18: and the owner of the motorbike accepted $100 to end their involvement in the matter.------The remaining owners of the two motorbikes and the other car owner demanded a higher price
column19: so the vehicles were removed to the Traffic Police Office in order to resolve the matter at a later date. ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/284323------ផ្សាយផ្ទាល់៖ ភ្នំពេញ៖  នារីស្រស់ស្អាតម្នាក់បើករថយន្តបណ្ដើរនិយាយទូរស័ព្ទបណ្ដើរក៏រ៉េចង្កូតទៅបុកម៉ូតូច្រើនគ្រឿងនឹងជ្រុលទៅបុករថយន្តមួយគ្រឿងទៀត ហេតុការណ៍នេះបានកើតនៅវេលាម៉ោង ៩យប់ថ្ងៃទី១១ ខែមករា ឆ្នាំ២០១៩ តាមបណ្ដោយផ្លូវព្រះសុីសុវត្តក្នុងសង្កាត់វត្ថភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ។ ដោយ/ ម៉ារ៉ា
